website_summaries.verdict: The price point is the biggest attraction for these goggles, which adjust easily. Comfortable fit can be hard for some owners to achieve, though.
pros: The goggles’ clip-together strap helps make putting them on pain-free
Very comfortable to wear, and leaks are rare to nonexistent
Style and colors are attractive, users note
cons: Nose clip doesn’t fit adult noses in some cases, and clip can break after just a few uses
Reports of rubber seal around eyepiece falling off

customer_reviews.title: I like the way this swim goggles looks
customer_reviews.text: I must say it's beyond my expectation. I like the way this swim goggles looks, the design is quite fashion! The elastic strap fits me perfectly and very easy to wear. It doesn't fog or leak at all. I feel comfortable wearing it. The complimentary hat, earplugs and nose clip are really helpful. The quality of this product is totally worth 10 dollar. I would rate it five star and would recommend to anyone who needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Lalala

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles, but uncomfortable cap
customer_reviews.text: Swim goggles are great and really helped (versus no goggles at all!). Swim cap however was not at all comfortable (very tight, and my head is not super big). I ended up purchasing a lycra swim cap that's a lot more comfortable than this rubber one. No complaints with the goggles after 1 swim lesson though!
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well sealing in the water and super clear vision, excellent replacement for those big name brands
customer_reviews.author: Yeling Z.

customer_reviews.title: This is a surprise
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprise, I bought a pair of swim goggles, but it also included swim cap, nose clip and ear plugs. The swim goggles is good, and I could see clearly under water, not seepage. But my favourite is this swim cap, it very comfortable, my before swim cap is tight. I have a very long hair, but it also can cover all and not so tight. I also recommended to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Xiao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: goggles feels very comfortable, cap is easy to put on, great products!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: i love swiming. i almost swimming everyday

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended for kids, easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: Best goggle I've ever bought. I love the clip on the back, Easy on an off. They stay fog-free and immediately create suction keeping all water out. Stays positioned and work very well, My boys like these. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: beibei xu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable around the head
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality product ~ better than I was expected.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, No water seeps in what so ever. Fast shipping. Very well packaged.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.text: Got this cap for my 8 year old. It got a tear in it less than 2 days after using it.

customer_reviews.title: I found a winner!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like these goggles! If you put them in the right place, they will not fog, I like the buttons on the back! I have a little face, they are perfect, very comfortable. only yesterday in the pool I received a compliment! The situation is also good ..... overall very satisfied with these, they are the price of great products ....

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for pool play and lap swimming
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the product yet and I will update it. Having said that, the product looks good and I like packaging!

customer_reviews.title: Really worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've had many more goggles than I can remember in my life time and these are by far the best.
